ComicInfo.Title: The Big Button; Ghostdance; The Fall of Angels and Other Misfits; Bad Bread; The Ear of Seeing; Survivor; The Actress and the Bishop Go Boating; A Taste of Gold; Festus: Dawn of the Dead; Heartsprings and Watchstops; Epilogue Prologue; Libretto; The Return of the Purple Claw; Bricktop; The Bandit Moons; The Hollow Circus; Lobster Rumpus

ComicInfo.Summary:
The Warpsmiths mourn their dead
Blazin' Glory foils a plot by Purple Claw to assassinate President Roosevelt.
